segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water, it's just gushing out of the faucet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink basin is already full to the brim, and it's spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a steady sheet of water down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is growing rapidly on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's actually standing right in it, oblivious to the dampness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone not notice their foot is soaking wet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly calm, which is astonishing given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the steady drip-drip of the water hitting the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This really is quite an impressive display of unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the water damage to those nice cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn that faucet off immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
